detectors.description:
Low level call in Address.sendValue(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__8.sol#268-274):
	- (success) = recipient.call{value: amount}() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__8.sol#272)

ERCToken.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__8.sol#555-559) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _mint(msg.sender,10000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals()))) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/ERCToken__8.sol#558)
